alert.note: Alert for DeSoto; Hardee; Hillsborough; Manatee; Polk; Sarasota (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 09 at 5:28PM EST until January 09 at 6:15PM EST by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: The National Weather Service in Ruskin has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Hardee County in central Florida... Eastern Manatee County in west central Florida... Southwestern Polk County in central Florida... Southeastern Hillsborough County in west central Florida... Northwestern DeSoto County in south central Florida... Central Sarasota County in west central Florida... * Until 615 PM EST. * At 528 PM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 13 miles east of Greater Sun Center to 7 miles west of Myakka City to 12 miles south of Gulf Gate Estates, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... North Port, Wauchula, Bowling Green, Myakka River State Park, Ona, South Venice, Myakka Head, Limestone, Myakka City, and Hidden River. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EST for south central, central and west central Florida.

area.areaDesc: DeSoto; Hardee; Hillsborough; Manatee; Polk; Sarasota
